Posts.Content: Cyberknife radiation treatment uses image guided technology and advanced technology with sub-millimeter accuracy. The unique aspect of this treatment is that it is able to distinguish between abnormal and healthy cells and destroy only the abnormal ones. It does not require any incision, it is bloodless and there is no pain involved. While conventional radiation therapy may take 20 to 40 treatments, cyberknife treatment requires just 1 to 5 sessions. There are just a handful of medical centers which offer cyberknife treatment. I know there are several all over the world, but I'm not sure whether there is one in Bangalore. For those living in New Jersey, the Riverview Medical Center offers this advance treatment. Check it: {Link deleted by admi per forum policy}
